attributes.action: Theory test certificate to be extended if about to run out because of cornavirus
attributes.additional_details: I think my theory test should be extended as it is due to run out but I can’t take my driving test due to COVID- 19  I am still working during these times so don’t see how it is not fair that I have to retake my theory test again even though I have already passed and paid for this; I also paid for a cancellation booking due to my theory running out in June now I am told I have to retake my theory!
attributes.background: To extend the theory test certificate if due to run out but can’t take the driving test due to corona virus when driving test has been cancelled I should not have to retake theory test again!
